text: At the entrance of the cinema the doorman was lying in wait for anyone who had red eyes. Grasping Catherine by her suffering arm, he said bitterly: 'Yes, why are you crying, he had to be punished for his crime, didn't he?' Catherine stared at him, incredulous. Philip rescued her by saying with disdain: 'Some people don't know right from wrong even when its demonstrated to them.
